snippet.title: Tree Trunk Brook - available now on Steam!
snippet.description:
Available now on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1441680/Tree_Trunk_Brook/

Tree Trunk Brook is a tiny adventure game about hiking during the pandemic. Follow trail blazes, take photos, make friends, and find lost items.

​The visitor center is closed, but the trail is open. Social distancing is in effect, and masks are required.

🌳 3 trails to explore
📸 14 photo locations
🧭 10 lost items
💚 11 hikers to befriend

If you’re looking for a short, relaxing, and cozy time, come visit our trails and be friends with our hikers!
